scripts.can-i-deploy:consumer: npx pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant katacoda-consumer-v2-10 --version $(npx -y absolute-version)-consumer --to-environment production
scripts.can-i-deploy:provider: npx pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant katacoda-provider-v2-10 --version $(npx -y absolute-version)-provider --to-environment production
scripts.record-deployment:consumer: npx pact-broker record-deployment --pacticipant katacoda-consumer-v2-10 --version $(npx -y absolute-version)-consumer --environment production
scripts.record-deployment:provider: npx pact-broker record-deployment --pacticipant katacoda-provider-v2-10 --version $(npx -y absolute-version)-provider --environment production
